Class FileHandler

java.lang.Object
ie.atu.sw.FileHandler
public class FileHandler extends Object
FileHandler Class - Handles the loading and processing of `.txt` files into appropriate data structures such as Maps for embeddings and Google words. This class includes methods for: - Loading embeddings into a Map. - Loading a filtered Google word set with corresponding embeddings. - Validating file paths to ensure correctness.
Author:
Eric Murray - G00423903

  • Method Details

    • loadEmbeddings

      public static Map<String,double[]> loadEmbeddings(String path) throws IOException
      Loads the embeddings from the specified file path into a Map. Each line in the file should be formatted as: word, vectorvalues[]
      Parameters:
      path - to the embeddings file.
      Returns:
      a Map where keys are words and values are their corresponding embedding vectors.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during file reading. Big-O Notation O(n * m) n: Number of words m: Number of vectors per word

    • loadGoogle

      public static Map<String,double[]> loadGoogle(String path, Map<String,double[]> embMap) throws IOException
      Loads the Google words from the specified file path and maps them to their corresponding embeddings from the provided embeddings Map. Only words that exist in the embeddings Map will be included.
      Parameters:
      path - to the Google words file.
      embMap - the embeddings Map containing word vectors.
      Returns:
      a Map of Google words with their corresponding embeddings.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during file reading. Big-O Notation O(n) n: Number of words in the google list
